title: Read this if you want to read about the game and how it is and how it works
text: So, this game is very fun there‚Äôs one impostor trying to kill all the crew mates. The crew mates job is to finish their tasks before the impostor wins. The impostors job is to kill all the crew mates before the crew mates win. You can also report body‚Äôs and call emergency meeting to discuss who is sus(suspicious.)  There is a chat box to discuss. If you see someone vent or kill you can report the body if you can go to the body or if you see them vent or kill run to the emergency meeting button.(if they vent or kill they are the impostor, there can be one, two, or three impostors.) you can host a game so you can create a game or you can join a game. But sometimes the game that you choose they may have already started and you may have to join a different one. The one weird thing is the host or if you host a game you can ban some people idk( I don‚Äôt know) why though.:/  They just updated the chat box where you can‚Äôt chat but you use this button thingy and I don‚Äôt really think it‚Äôs necessary  when you can just type it your self. So to the people who create this can you please change it back to how it was please and thank you. Thank you too all the people who have read all of this, I hope this helped!‚ù§Ô∏èbye‚ù§Ô∏è

title: I used to love it but you now destroyed the whole concept and theme of the game
text: This will be a very long list of all of the things I now hate about among us because of the update 1. Whenever I load into free play or online my whole screen turns black, when I‚Äôm online it lasts longer but it still bothers me and I am not a patient child 2. QUICKCHAT IS THE WORST. when a meeting is called I just kind of wished I could actually skip it because whenever I want to say something I have to press the wheel go to all of the functions find what I need then out the name in it the place I was in and by 5e time I‚Äôm done with that the meeting is over and everyone suspects me it annoys me so much I just hate the quick chat, so please stop the quickchat. From now on anyone I meet who mentions among us I will tell them that I hate it and that they should not play it so until you fix the among us quickchat I will be saying among us is lame and that people should not play it. I used to love this game and played it every day but you will lose me and many of the people that I tell that among us is awful until you turn off quickchat because quickchat destroyed the whole theme of among us. I MEAN in one of your descriptions you said among us came up with a new slang word called ‚Äúsus‚Äù BUT YOU TOOK OUT THE WORD SUS AND REPLACED IT WITH THE DUMB OLD WORD SUSPICOUS. And that is the end of my review

title: Was great until the update
text:
This game was great. I have fond memories of playing with my friends and family, and it was always fun and random, so I could play up to an hour and not be bored. But, after the update, it wasn‚Äôt fun, and it was even kinda annoying. They created an account system, so if you don‚Äôt have an account, too bad. You can‚Äôt change your name to what you want, and instead go through random names like MeanCar and so on. That‚Äôs not so bad, but it gets worse. If you also don‚Äôt have an account, you can only talk with a horrible talk selections, which makes it hard to even talk. That may not be an issue in other games, but communicating with the players in this game is vital to find out whose the imposter, or other things like saying things like ‚Äú good game‚Äù and so on. Obviously, I wanted to make an account as soon as possible, but after I put in my birthday, it told me to enter my Apple ID, so I did, but it STILL didn‚Äôt let me create an account. I‚Äôve heard of some people who are just kids, and when they enter their birthday, it will ask the parents permission, but after that it asks the parent info about themselves, which is very annoying. I tried playing after this horrendous update, but for me, it‚Äôs impossible. I understand why Innersloth would do this, but this is as far away from a much better solution as they could get.
Sorry for the long review, I had a lot to say :)

title: The chat
text:
I know this has been talked about in the past but something happened to the chat rather a glitch or you changed it, but just last week I was able to talk using the chat freely but now I cant again. It made the game so much more fun and a lot easier to communicate when we were able to talk freely. I don‚Äôt know if that is just me or others but it was a bit frustrating when I was trying to say something and it was not working. I liked the way it was where if you were under a certain age you had to get permission because I have a little sister and sometimes something would happen that shouldn‚Äôt happen with her but for people like me, I would like to be able to talk freely again. If you could please fix that it would definitely make the game better. 

Also, I have played with some really fun people and would like to be able to play with them again so like if we could have like a friends thing and maybe you get like a notification when they are playing and what thing they are in. As long as it‚Äôs not private. And even like a playing request if it is a private game so that you could still invite them that would also make the game a lot better. I hope this is heard and go into action because it would be so fun.

title: I hate the chat update
text: Me and my friends updated among us, soon couple days later were they were screaming about this new update, I didn‚Äôt know what they meant so I immediately went to among us, I saw the new starting screen and I loved it I thought I was getting into something amazing I was so excited... but then I played with my friends and realized Red killed I saw the blood animation and a dead body and at the corner of my eye I saw red so I ran to the emergency meeting button I pressed it and tapped the text bar and got ready to explain to everyone that red killed, on my call I screamed at my friends saying I can‚Äôt type they said that they updated the game by that time red had blamed me and my 2 friends on my call is not enough to keep me in the game, I was so mad about this update I left the game for about 4 moths. Later on my friend said play among us with me I said no because I was still mad they said that they didn‚Äôt have the update anymore and chat was back to normal so he said ‚Äúall you have to do is update‚Äù I updated and got in the game I was hopeful and cheerful I got in the game and everything was normal then I got to the loading screen and it was so cute so I was expecting the best then I saw the knew map ‚Äúso exciting‚Äù I thought then I saw chat... it was the same. Let‚Äôs just say I won‚Äôt be playing among us for a while.

title: Good game BUT BUGS QUICK CHAT
text:
First of all this is a great game but there is a few issues like people walking in walls but really aren't and you are on their screen. The next thing i'd like to report is that when the imposter leaves in a meeting it won't automatically make the crewmates win, it will wait until the end of the meeting to crash everyone's game. The next thing is sabotaging bugs. The latest game i played it the imposter sabotaged O2 but then when it got to zero the numbers went onto negatives all the way to -11. The next important bug is when you are quick chatting, you might vote someone without knowing. The second to last thing i would like to share is on a mobile device when you first load in it just has part of the o and ng in, probably trying to say among us but it only says ong. Finally, the game is great and all, but i think the quick chat feature kind of got the game to become less popular, because you can't say what you want to say, or people just spam their quick chat thing so even when you say no one will see it or even believe i
t! You can't even say hi or talk about the latest game! Heck you can't even say gg! Are we even going to talk about when you try to join the game it says "the game is full" when it only showed 2 people in it! Also a lot of the time when you quick chat the letters are not in the chat box you made it's just somewhere out of it! PLEASE FIX THESE BUGS SOON INNERSLOTH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Well i think there is a problem
text: I got the game a while ago and for a while it was really fun to play but then I had an encounter with what I think was a hacker, now i know that there is a lot of hackers on the game but this one was kinda freaky, I joined a public game and I happened to be imposter but the settings were one imposter and someone else got imposter so there were two, which didn‚Äôt make sense. Any ways I played and like the third meeting they voted the other imposter out and right before they left they said ‚ÄúI am a virus that you can never get rid of, I will alway be here‚Äù so obviously that was a little unnerving but I kept playing because I just thought they were trying to freak me out, i ended up winning and when I was waiting for the next game to start the second imposter started talking again about how they are a virus that can‚Äôt be fixed. I got freaked out and left the game, mind you I like never get imposter 90% of the time I am crew mate but every game I joined after that I got imposter, and if I stayed in that same game I would repeatedly get imposter, so idk if I actually got a virus or if it is just dumb luck or whatever you want to call that but recently there have been a lot more hackers like that that I think are just trying to freak people out. The game is really fun but hackers kinda ruin it, they make the game pointless

title: Best games out there, Huge issue with old devices, and big issue with hackers
text:
I‚Äôm a HUGE fan of among us, can‚Äôt believe it took 2 years to be noticed. But there‚Äôs a big issue for people with lower end devices, like iPhone 6 and down, or IPad mini 2-3 and down. It‚Äôs the old devices which are struggling to enjoy Among Us. The reason why (which should be fairly obvious), is that it kicks you out whether you want to talk or trying to do a task. It‚Äôs very annoying when I try playing on my ipad, which is a IPad mini 2. So this game needs an update so that this game can truly support these old devices so that everyone can have a good time.

Hackers are the reason why people have bad days, they can end meetings quickly so they‚Äôre not caught, they can see the ghost chat, they can make people say that they‚Äôre impostor even thought they don‚Äôt want to. Though the host as the ability to kick, sometimes they just don‚Äôt, or the hacker is the host. I know it‚Äôs asking a lot from 3 devs who made this game by themselves, but we need a reporting button, so we can report these hackers and bring them to justice

So yea these are my only critics about the game Among Us. But besides that, this game is one of the best games I‚Äôve ever played.

title: So rizzy rizzler gyatt fanum tax skibity Ohio Sigma
text:
There once was a boy named Gyatt who had an obsession with watching the Skibidi toilet. Every day, he would watch it over and over and over again, laughing hysterically each time. He was so obsessed that he couldn't stop watching it, even when he needed to sleep or eat or just take a break. He was constantly glued to the screen, watching the Skibidi toilet with a huge grin on his face. It was the most entertaining thing in the world to him, and he couldn't get enough of it. No one knew why he loved it so much, but it was his favorite thing to do. 

The boy's obsession with the Skibidi toilet eventually lead to him being isolated from his peers. He was constantly mocked and bullied for being so weird and different, and he didn't understand why nobody else seemed to enjoy the Skibidi toilet as much as he did. But despite the ridicule and the isolation, the boy still couldn't shake his love for the Skibidi toilet. He continued to watch it every day, and he didn't care what anyone thought of him. It was more important to him than anything else in the world.

Among us allowed him to find creatures of his own kind and socialize with skibity sigmas around the world.

title: Super Addictive and Fun Game!
text:
I love this game! Very fun and a great time killer. I love the different maps and how you can change the amount of players (and the nicknames) Just a small thought that I had: I‚Äôd think it‚Äôd be fun to have another map that was a boat. Like one of the tasks could be steering the ship...I don‚Äôt know but I thought that would be fun. Do whatever! I also love the additional abilities for the impostor! (Venting, Sabotages, still have the ability to Report and call Emergency Meetings) I have no down-hills for this game accept one thing. I do appreciate the censoring on the chat, but it‚Äôs kind of hard to communicate with the new update where you have a limited selection of phrases and statements, etc. I‚Äôm not asking you to take the update away, (I don‚Äôt want to make anything difficult for you!) Just saying it‚Äôs a little tough to talk accordingly with others and to discuss our thoughts to locate the impostor. Other than that, I love it! Thank you! (It‚Äôs amazing!)

Review Update:

So, Among Us got an update. I can‚Äôt play anymore, because I used to play this game on an iPod but now it‚Äôs iOS13 or later. I‚Äôm upset because I was really looking forward to this new update...and now I don‚Äôt even get a chance to use it. Can‚Äôt play anymore and very sad. is there a way to fix this???

title: This game is good but a few problems
text:
I played Among Us for years, and it still is fun for me. But recently I‚Äôve seen this app having lots of problems. First of all when I tried to play a game it would just say the server is not working. All the time. There is nothing wrong with my WIFI and it has been working on this WIFI before. So it‚Äôs a bug in the game. Also, why does the game show servers that are full and have already started? This seems unnecessary and only a major inconvenience. This game shows incorrect number of players too. When I join a game with 4/15 players, it almost is full. Can you guys fix this too. I think this game needs some different mods of the game to make it less boring. 
For example, I think we need a Hide And Seek version of the game to make it more fun, sense a lot of people played this game. I‚Äôm almost done, but can you bring back the chats? I think just removing them is not the way to go. I think if someone is using in appropriate language, their account can be removed, so other people that deserve to use the chat can. And can we make our own names too? Again, people with inappropriate names can just have their account removed.
Thank you for listening to my review ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏èüòä

title: Probs the best game out there.
text: Alright. I‚Äôll start off by saying this is a great game and I have never run into hackers. The second thing is this: sometimes people are wicked SMART so when you try to trick them they see right through the lie. Other times the people are so DUMB that it‚Äôs Wicked easy to win. For example one time I was playing and there was this person who said that I was the impsoter (which I wasn‚Äôt) and every body‚Äôs like ok let‚Äôs do what he says but so then somebody asks Proof? And the person is like I saw them in cafeteria. And they‚Äôre like ‚Äúdoing WHAT?‚Äù And the guys like : nothing. So then everybody votes the guy who said it‚Äôs me and he‚Äôs the imposter. Then one time I was playing and somebody said vote yellow i saw him vent and then somebody else is like How vote? And then the other person said: how long have you been playing this game and the person says 2 years. It‚Äôs like lol HOW can you NOT know how to vote after playing the game for 2 YEARS. But so back to the point, this is the best game ever. I have never seen a game like this and probably never will. I won‚Äôt ask you guys to add anything else because I know the game is fragile and adding anything else could break the whole game. Hope development is going good for AmongUs2

title: LOVE IT SO FUN but...
text: This review is coming from a 9 year old but I love the game. This game has an exiting plot and some bugs are fixed according to the updatesüëç. It is pretty violent, with the killing and all but if that was changed it wouldn‚Äôt be among us anymore. The updates have made the game even better! it is super addicting. But there‚Äôs a REALLY big problem... Cyberbullying.üòí I was cyber bullied twice and the first time wasn‚Äôt bad but the second one i thought white was sus, and I said it in the chat. and he turned out not to be impostor and in the next game he said to me, ‚Äú****‚Äù ‚ÄúDumb ***‚Äù ‚ÄúStupid‚Äù and of course I reported him, but people with quick chat can easily cyber bully and reporting didn‚Äôt REALLY fix it. After that my parents banned me from among us unless I am playing on freeplay. So I think that there should be an option of what type of chat is in the game, like two options where one is to only play online with people who have the chat where you select what you want to say, not type it. The other option could be where you only play with people who have quick chat. Please add this to one of the updates. It would be safer and appreciated.üôÇ

title: New Map
text: So I was so excited to play among us sense they have a new map, but when I started playing, I noticed glitches about the new map and how they updated the game. That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs 4 stars. The first thing that was really annoying is that when you enter a game with the new map, I couldn‚Äôt say anything in the chat, and that is annoying because when people asked my a question, I couldn‚Äôt respond. Another glitch that happened was when I pressed the account button, and I pressed randomized name, when I tried to put a name in the box to to put a name that you wanted, it wouldn‚Äôt work so now I can‚Äôt change my name. The last glitch that happened was when I was in a room and the game was about to start, but for about a minute it was just a black screen until the game started. This isn‚Äôt a big of a deal for me, but before the game actually started, a lot of people would leave and then when the game actually started, there would only be a few people playing and the game would end really fast because there was only a few people playing. All of these things made the new airship map not as fun as I expected it to be. I hope the among us creators read this review and fix these problems. But the other maps are still fun the play on.

title: I Love this!! But needs an update
text:
I love this game, but I also wanted to say that people have been playing a new version within the game that is also fun. They call it the hide and seek version. It‚Äôs not an actual update, but I think the creators could make it an update. Like have there be not only the different places, but another setting set up specially for the hide and seek version. Like have there be imposters, seekers, and one hider. The hider goes and hides some where, like in special areas. The seekers goal is to look for the hider, by doing tasks to open different areas around the ship where the hider could be hiding. The hider can transfer hiding spots like venting, but can‚Äôt go in the unlocked places that tasks have been done in. The imposters goal is to kill all the seekers. Imposters don‚Äôt vent from thing to thing, they vent from room to room. The goal of the imposter is basically the same: kill everyone and sabotage. The goal of the seekers: to find the hider, prevent sabotage, and unlock all the places. The hiders goal: is to hide throughout the entire game not getting caught. The hider can‚Äôt kill, but they can sabotage, as there goal is to win.
I hope you consider this idea for an update!   
Like seriously a big update would be really nice this game is getting a little less exiting...

title: Opinions
text: There should be an option for reporting player names and room names people are making racist and sexist names for them. There should also be options for more members to join the game if people disconnect in the being beginning because of connection issues. I love the game and its addictive but these options would help make the game fuller and less crappy for children that play. It would be fun to have a ‚Äúhidden vote‚Äù option for each individual player to choose so no one can see who they vote for. Also there are players that ruin the game for others like hackers, and people who are know it alls there should be a limit to how many times each individual person can call a meeting  in a row besides the limit the creator sets. I would say make it un-hackable but thats not a option there should be a way to report them for hacking that gets them banned or something like that so they know not to do it. A friend system would be cool so like players could play again. And the error that comes up when you pick a room is weird why be on the open room list if you cant join they should disappear without having to be refreshed when full. Again these are just opinions. But I would rate 5 stars if there was a way to report people at least. :)

title: Certain Glitch in Polus Map
text: This game has been perfectly updated to its full potential except for one thing. I‚Äôm on an iOS device right now (iPad,) and I play Among Us on a regular basis. I used to just play the main map, (I forgot what it‚Äôs called üòÖ) but after some time of watching others playing in the other maps, I took an interest into them. The Polus map though, (I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs the name of it but it got the red, orange, and yellow lava when you vote someone off and such) has a of task bug. It isn‚Äôt crazy, but it‚Äôs just that some tasks like the red screen task next to the lava near emergency room has a weird glitch where when I press ‚Äúuse‚Äù the game wouldn‚Äôt register it and the game wouldn‚Äôt let me even go into the task. All I‚Äôm saying through this review is that you should check that out. It‚Äôs that task I mentioned and another one I think near MedBay. It would be deeply appreciated if you could fix those bugs because I love that map and it‚Äôs probably my favorite one yet. Other than that, thanks for making such a great game, and as another request, I would love to see the limited hat with the lights for Christmas. Would make my day to see it again. üôè

title: This is the best game I‚Äôve ever played
text: This game has made my quarantine better in so many ways. I have met lots of people and made so many new friends, but there are some things that I think are a nuisance. First off is the glitches and bugs. Yesterday I was playing the game and played a few games with a fellow player, and we really bonded and got to know each other. As I was typing in my personal information for the player I was booted out because of a glitch that said that I am playing Among Us on an older version. I was so sad and frustrated. A friend request would really help with that. I know the help team is currently working on it, and I will try to live with it until that feature comes out. Another thing is that maybe having the ability to private chat someone unless you are dead would be awesome, so that if you are willing to give your phone number or snap to someone they can only see it and not everyone in the whole game. I‚Äôm also really happy that there is a censor feature as some players curses can be quite offensive and vulgar at times. Thank you so much for creating this awesome game and if you are reading this please consider downloading  it and enjoy your day!

title: Free chat = not a good idea üò•

title: Great game, but one thing..
text: It‚Äôs such an amazing game! I love all the cute hats, and I really love talking in the chat. (I talk nice in the chat I promise) I love doing all my tasks, and I also really really love inviting my friends into servers too! But, there‚Äôs just one thing that really annoys me..updates. Like, whenever u update the game, like for example, the new April fools update that‚Äôs going on right now, it‚Äôs just kinda annoying to me, and I don‚Äôt like the updates, at all. I show my friends the new updates bc they haven‚Äôt seen it yet, and they r like, ‚Äúwhat?! This is just so confusing, I don‚Äôt like this new update, it‚Äôs annoying!‚Äù  So they try the game out and that‚Äôs what they say about the all the new crazy updates u do to this game. I mean, some updates I like, but some is annoying to me. I also really think that u should not make really crazy updates to this game. I‚Äôm not trying to say that u shouldn‚Äôt update the game, I‚Äôm just trying to say that u shouldn‚Äôt make updates that r annoying. I‚Äôm also not trying to be mean, I‚Äôm just saying there is a problem. Although, this game is an amazing game, and it‚Äôs awesome to communicate with others all over the world! I recommend getting this game! It‚Äôs worth it, trust me. Thank u for reading, have a great life, and god bless u^^

title: Ok
text:
Ok, so, I would recommend this game for social deseption. The problem is, people SWEAR A LOT! The game also try‚Äôs to prevent this, but people get through this very small obstacle. Also, if you care, they take the lord‚Äôs name in vein. A LOT. Otherwise though, this is a great game! I don‚Äôt recommend this game for Public play.

New Edit: The new Airship map is huge and amazing, also, they fixed the swearing part of the game, but it‚Äôs still a 4 Star Review because of the limited chat options. This really helps with the swearing like I said, but it takes away most of the feel for Among Us. Also, a lot of things I want to say are limited. Like, for example: one of the questions you can ask is if this is an emergency meeting or a dead body, but I haven‚Äôt seen a way to answer that question. In order to fix this, I feel that you should update the game to Blank out swear words. You could also expand the options of questions or let the players write their own and have the game allow or block this. As well as having the option to ban a player completely from the game if you could go through a couple games yourself and see who swears and ban them according. Also, I‚Äôm stuck with a random name and I can‚Äôt change it. I‚Äôm stuck with Dullshape now. üôÅ

title: The most ANNOYING part of the game
text: So overall this game is great. It‚Äôs fun to be a crewmate and even better to be imposter. The only problem is: The Players. Well some players are ok, a lot of them of just horrible. One of the most annoying people you will encounter are the emergency meeting people. These people call a meeting for NO reason. They will either call a meeting to accuse someone for no reason or call a meeting at the start of the game to say ‚Äúhi.‚Äù It‚Äôs just annoying that people waste time and it‚Äôs even worse when they don‚Äôt vote and the voting time is so long. Next is the people who don‚Äôt believe you even when you have a ridiculous amount of evidence. You see someone kill, vent, or run from a body and report it, it takes one word for people to convince others to vote for you. After then we have the people who leave. As soon as the game starts, as SOON AS THE GAME STARTS, people will leave because they are not the imposter. It‚Äôs annoying for the crewmates and the imposters because the game ends immediately. Just wait and you with be the imposter people. Is it that hard to WAIT?! Huh?! Anyway, just because almost EVERY SINGLE PERSON THAT PLAYS THIS GAME IS THE ANNOYING, doesn‚Äôt mean you shouldn‚Äôt play this. It is a fun game to play if you ignore all the other people.

title: There are more cons than pros
text: I‚Äôve spent many hours on this game and I‚Äôve enjoyed it. However I did find more cons than pros. Let‚Äôs start off with finding a server. You have three different maps to choose from. You can also choose if you want to play with 1, 2, or 3 imposters. The imposter‚Äôs job is to sabotage, kill and lie. However almost everyone play with ‚ÄúConfirm Ejects‚Äù and ‚ÄúVisual Tasks‚Äù on. Confirm ejects means that when someone is voted out it says ‚Äú(insert anything here) was not An Imposter‚Äù or ‚Äúwas An Imposter‚Äù. With it being the imposter‚Äôs job to lie, this feature makes it ridiculously harder for the imposter to win and makes the game unfair. Visual tasks are tasks that some people can watch and confirm you are a crewmate. If you have these on with confirm ejects, you can almost guarantee a crewmate win. These features make this game incredibly unfair and should not be a thing. If you get offended by swear words, DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME!! This game is ruled by immature 12 year olds and when they get accused, they break lose. I am not exaggerating, I have heard the N word, the F word, and so many other ridiculously bad and racist words in this game than I did in the real world. The N word is a word that you will encounter. People think it‚Äôs okay if they leave the hard r out but it‚Äôs not. The N word is probably the most popular word in this game. I could go on and on but these are the main reasons why I gave it one star

title: Fix bugs please
text: This app is the best I have ever played. I started playing it about a day ago since everyone on the Internet was raving about it. I had to check it out so I downloaded it. When I first entered the game it took about 14 seconds for it to load. It‚Äôs kind of annoying because I expect a lot from games that are rated so high. But anyways I joined a game and started playing in a match. The game lasted about five minutes, but then it showed a black screen and kicked me out of the app. This happens multiple times when I join an online match. It‚Äôs quite annoying. Whenever I join a game, after about a couple minutes it boots me out and the game says that I ‚Äúleft‚Äù. If you could please fix this bug, it‚Äôd be very much appreciated because it would help the game a lot more. I hate how it kicks me out and I was never able to finish a match once. Other than that I think that this app is very good and I recommend it to people of all ages. I like that you can censor out the chat, if someone says anything inappropriate. Sometimes, when I try to join a game it says that it‚Äôs full. Why make some thing available to you if it‚Äôs going to be full? Thank you, I think this app is great.

title: update is a problem

Another thing, i don‚Äôt really get the reason for having to put your card information in because i‚Äôm a teenager (old enough to play) but i don‚Äôt have a card nor account. i just want to be able to play with my own name as werg (i don‚Äôt see a problem with ‚Äúwerg‚Äù) and being able to chat without having to look for where every word is. the quick chat is too complex, in my opinion, and my friends agree too. and at times, we can‚Äôt call so we need the chat. And i accidentally put my age as 10 when i was on call one time, but i had to switch back and forth and put 2010 instead of 2003. so now i‚Äôm stuck with having to look for the chat and having a name i rlly hate. please consider my suggestions and other‚Äôs suggestions who have the same problem. thank you.

title: Report Button
text: I really like playing among us.  One thing I don‚Äôt like, is playing with people who make me not like playing the game. This one time, I was playing with these people, and somone reported a body.  Then, two of the players said it was black. But I defended black by saying that we were together, and that he/she was safe.  But they both said one thing, that the imposter is black, because he‚Äôs black. I was shocked. I told them that it wasn‚Äôt black, but they voted black out. Then, one of them called an emergency meeting and said that I should get voted off because I was friends with black. They were using racist slurs, and saying racist things like: the imposter is always black or brown, black was trying to rob me. Stuff like that.  I left the game before they could vote me off.  It‚Äôs horrible that I can‚Äôt even enjoy a simple game, because these two people were being racist. I just want there to be an option to report people, and if there is, I would like to know how to use it.  I play among us everyday and I think it‚Äôs really fun. It‚Äôs just sad that there are people out there who choose to play games instead of educating themselves about serious matters.

title: Good but one word: Hackers
text:
Among us is a really fun game entertaining, addictive, but I have some major issues with this game:
1. You guessed it: Hackers, These people are super annoying and upright disrespectful and just infuriating. I mean there where many games where I would be playing enjoying the game then a hacker decides to bomb the game and cheat making it impossible to play against. Then you have those troll hackers who toy with you before killing everyone in 1 sec. Or change everyone‚Äôs name to something weird or inappropriate. Honestly hackers are single handedly killing this game. I suggest making it so that hackers can‚Äôt hack into the game, more security, what ever works to get rid of these people.
2. Disconnecting, times where I click a lobby that could have 2 people and it say game full, ‚Äúgame started already‚Äù, or just straight up disconnects me. It‚Äôs gotten a bit better I will say but still slightly annoying. Or times where I‚Äôm in the middle of a task or running then disconnects. This ones a bit more minor then #1 but still an honorable mention. There are some other honorable mentions such as really rude people but honestly I understand that that‚Äôs just with any online game. However the hackers, that is honestly my biggest issue. Really fun game but the hackers HAVE GOT TO GO.

title: About that new feature..
text:
Okay, I love this game. It‚Äôs pretty cool actually. But that new feature in the update where you have to fill in an entire prompt? Yeah... that‚Äôs gotta be fixed. I understand that people have treated this game like a dating site or cyber bullying but there has to be another solution. It takes me forever to find what I want to say, find the name of the potential impostor/imposter (I don‚Äôt even know-) and then fill out an entire prompt. This actually happened earlier today and I barely got to finish what I wanted to say, because voting was over. I like the game but it‚Äôs honestly kind of getting boring now that I can‚Äôt say different things. The suggestions you put in there like ‚Äúyeet‚Äù- like where does that phrase even apply-

The point of the game is to (from a Crewmate‚Äôs point of view) catch impostors and win the game, and (from an Impostor‚Äôs point of view) to kill as many people as possible and win the game. This is probably why all those voice chat games for Among Us are getting popular, because we can‚Äôt even express ourselves, and apparently saying ‚Äúyeet‚Äù randomly is normal and not at all unrelated or unnecessary..? But overall good game and try to be a little more creative when it comes to the chat üòâ you guys are doing great

title: Among us was good but now...
text: Among us an absolute best of all time mobile game, but the recent chat update has, in my opinion, completely ruined the game. I understand that with freedom of speech comes those who use for unsavory acts but the whole point of a mafia/among us type game is to be deceptive or as honest as possible. I don‚Äôt know how I‚Äôm really supposed to play when all that is said is player names and ‚Äúlies‚Äù or ‚Äúno‚Äù or ‚Äúidk‚Äù. I hope that the devs at least allow for people to change whether or not to have chat wheels in the game, as I could see that helping with the progress of the game even further, with new ideas coming into play like how people thought of hide n seek for it. At the very least, I think that if the devs want the game to come back, because I know a lot of people will leave it because of this, then they should work on ways of allowing people to have they freedom or not with the chat. Inner sloth, if you read this, thanks for all the hard work you have put into among us, and I‚Äôm really glad to have played it, but please consider this change that I know others would want along with me. The whole point of the game, as I have stated, is the deception and honesty that can not be used with the new chat system. The new map would come in even better if you changed this along with it.

title: Amazing game
text: I normally don‚Äôt like popular things but this is a great game. Props to the artist who made the map designs it‚Äôs so cute and the amount of detail is just phenomenal. I do think friend requests would be great though. I don‚Äôt like to play public server type games because of rude people. There has been a handful of nice people I‚Äôve met and since I don‚Äôt want to give them private ways to talk to me because I still want to be cautious, friend requests could help so I could have a family friendly nice game with people I kind of know. I think more tasks would be great. Also if we could have more people in the game would be fun too. However I think if we could ban certain types of names like inappropriate ones and extremely rude names. I love the idea of the game and how addictive it is. Unfortunately I haven‚Äôt been able to click on some tasks due to glitches so if that could be fixed that‚Äôd be great so I could have more task wins. There are glitches here and there but they aren‚Äôt unbearable. I don‚Äôt know why people would want more roles personally I think that‚Äôs a bit much but maybe a few more character and hat designs would be really cute. Can‚Äôt wait for the new map next month!!!

title: Suggestions & Tips
text: First, this is a really good game to play with friends and family members. But there is a problem, Some people play this game with inappropriate nicknames, like c*ckdaddy, c*msock, and etc. If there is a possible way to curse out the bad names and the bad people that say cuss words in the chat, that would be amazing. I would love to see more maps and colors, and hats,  For the season. Their are Halloween hats. But I don‚Äôt want those to replace with Christmas hats. There also should be more normal hats that the players can use. And maybe it would be really fun to add new roles, maybe one person is a nurse to help dead body‚Äôs but they have a limit that is in the game settings. There also should be new k*ll animations instead of neck twisting, g*n shooting. Also, It isn‚Äôt that good to let the parents pay for clothes, and mini crew mates. It isn‚Äôt that fair to the other players that are on the game and to the people who do have the stuff that you need to pay for. There should be more colors for people to choose on the computer in the among us game, like navy blue, grey, teal, magenta, violet, peach. If the among us developers could fix these problems I‚Äôve seen that would be great. And maybe you could add these suggestions.

title: Undeserved ban

title: New Update is AWESOME! Huge thanks to the devs!!!
text:
Okay, so when this game came out, it was fun because it was a new concept, and was extremely fun. But the game got old. After a while, I found myself playing less and less. And the new update only pushed me further away. But the current update drew me back in, and I. AM. HOOKED. The new leveling up system makes the game so much more engaging, and the optional micro transactions are reasonable. The new roles make the game feel fresh and takes away the likelihood that you are just going to be walking around doing tasks as a normal crew mate. The roles also add a bunch of new strategies for impostors and crew mates alike. One annoying thing is that the game doesn‚Äôt play well on cellular data, but that is a reasonable thing that happens. Keep going guys, thanks so much!!!

One last thing for the devs‚Ä¶ I have a suggestion (if you ever read this) for a new role. It would be cool if there was a role where players had walkie talkies, and they had like a 45 second cool down where people could privately chat without a meeting being called. Again, thanks so much for working so hard on this amazingly fun yet simplistic game!!!!

title: It was good until the update.
text: Among Us was good until the recent update. Now I can't type anything useful along with all of the other players. Nobody talks and it's hard to chat. For something like a gaming console it looks good, but on mobile and PC it is not. I can type A Lot faster than I can navigate through the new chat system. From a strategic standpoint, I used to be able to make a convincing story of someone else doing the killing instead of me. If I was a crewmate, I could defend myself from accusations or take the offense on someone who is sus. Now all I can say is, "He is sus," or, "Body in Reactor." It takes a while to go through the new thing and I can't even say which colors, which is what most people say. If this is supposed to keep kids safe from the internet then what about the censor chat feature? It keeps the language out while still letting people actually talk. Anybody under the age of 10 should have Quick Chat. I don't think that teenagers should be stick with this also. Literally as a 16 year old I find it really annoying that I can't chat as easily and fast as I used to be able to. Among Us has already lost some of its popularity; this move will only accelerate the trend. Players can't have anywhere close to as much fun as they used to be able to.

title: Why I hate this new update
text: Among us, it‚Äôs a fun game that people of all ages love but this new update is annoying. Why it‚Äôs A annoying. This update makes it hard to type and this so called safe environment is dum. If a player feels like they are getting attacked then they just leave the game and join a new one. If this does not work then they can play with friends or uninstall the game. Another thing is that it feels like you ‚Äú the among us savers ‚Äú are taking away freedom of speech. How?    If someone can‚Äôt say what they want to say about this or that it feels like you censored who that person,thing,or whatever is. However you might say this ‚Äúwell we also have it we‚Äôre if your 18 plus (example for age) you can say what you want to say ‚Äú and your right but but but most people that play this game are under 18 plus as of myself. So these people who have to deal with this new way of ‚Äúspeech‚Äù would most likely not like this but then again I‚Äôm not them. If you feel like I‚Äôm wrong then I‚Äôm wrong if you feel like I‚Äôm right then I‚Äôm right but I‚Äôm just shooting out there that this ‚Äúupdate‚Äù might or should I say will effect this games success in a good way or bad way and if it does effect it in a bad way then at least you would know why. Thank you for reading this and I love the among us community and the people in it and the game I‚Äôm just hoping you would listen to what I have to say thank you and good bye.

title: This game is amazing but could use some changes
text: This game is the best game of the year! I really do recommend it! It‚Äôs really fun to play with friends and family:) although I do have some recommendations! I feel like we should not pay for pets hats or clothing because I feel like it‚Äôs very unnecessary! Instead of having to buy them I think there should be like a daily mystery wheel where you can win items or maybe every time you win a game you get coins and are able to buy items with them? I also think that there should be a report button for everyone even if they aren‚Äôt dead just in case they are being inappropriate! I also think we shouldn‚Äôt be able to say bad words because some people take advantage of that and start being inappropriate :( I also think there should be a setting where you are able to add friends so you can play with crew mates again! Although this game is amazing! I really do recommend it! Edit: not sure what this is but for some reason some of the hats have been removed for example I was trying to wear the devil hat and it was not there in the inventory and I know the hat wasn‚Äôt removed because someone else was also wearing it so I‚Äôm not sure if this is some type of bug!)
